description.narrative: The development objective of the proposed Project is to improve the conditions of teaching, learning and research for enhanced access, quality and relevance of tertiary education.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Appendix 11 | Description :HEC shall implement the Project in accordance with the Environmental and SocialManagement Plan (ESMP). | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Article II, 2.05; Schedule 2, Section IV, B | Description :Disbursement of the proceeds of the Credit forComponent 1 of the Project will be processed semi-annually based on fulfillment of DLIs as defined in Annex 1 of PAD. | Frequency:Yearly

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement, Schedule 2, Section I.C.2. (a) and (b) | Description :HEC shall carry out the followingsurveys: (i) Public Expenditure Tracking Survey ; (ii) a labor market survey. | Due Date :30-Sep-2014

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement, Schedule III, 1 | Description :HEC shall maintain a procurement website, publicly accessible,and a record keeping system acceptable to the Association. | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, C | Description :HEC shall establish a TESP Steering Committee. | Due Date :01-Jul-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II, B. 2. | Description :GOP shall produce interim-unaudited financial reports within 45days of the end of semesters ending March 31and September 30 to support disbursements | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section IV, B.1.(b) (vii) (A) | Description :Identification and appointment of two dedicatedprocurement specialists, with qualifications and experience acceptable to the Bank | Due Date :31-Dec-2011
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section IV, B.1.(b) (vii) (B) | Description :HEC shall develop, adopt and implement throughout thePOM. | Due Date :31-Oct-2011
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section IV, B.1.(b) | Description :Establishment of TESP Secretariat | Due Date :01-Jul-2011
